response.original_title: Attractive Model is a Billionaire CEO
response.overview: In Attractive Model is a Billionaire CEO movie: on the night of her divorce, Selina's best friend ordered the top escort, Morgan, at a high-end club. Morgan claimed to be a professional male model, while Selina pretended to be an unemployed office worker. It wasn't until Selina started working at ZT Group that she noticed the new president had the same scratch marks on his neck as that night, and his magnetic voice was all too familiar. At the merger meeting, he threw Selina's proposal in front of her ex-husband and saying: "After all, your wife... no, your ex-wife's taste is indeed much more refined than your lover's."
response.title: Attractive Model is a Billionaire CEO
